divs: sighting details4: 40 am july 1 2008...i got home from work and parked my car at in front of my apartment. every night i look into the sky always looking for something, for proof. i noticed more stars than usual and they were flashing \ twinkling more than usual. after gazing for about 2 minutes i noticed several of them moving slowly to the west and then disappearing. there were two more patches east of the location, one patch had three lights. i noticed this one because a light turned on "like a light bulb" and started moving west, and the two other faint lights followed and disappeared into the blackness. the second patch i mentioned was only two lights that repeated the previous steps moving slowly to the west. after trying to understand what i just saw a meteor like object soared from west to east. i thought it was amazing. what i seen that night has no other explanation. i look up every night when i get home for a few minutes to see something real, and i finally have! i will definitely look a little more often and spend a little more time gazing among the stars from now on. sorry i don't have any photos, this is the first time something has ever caught my eye while looking for ufo's. i didn't want to miss any of it.
